name: Cock and Ball Torture
description: '''Cock and Ball Torture''' (also known as '''CBT''') is a German [[goregrind]] band formed on 22 February 1997. The group is known for its groove-heavy riffing and [[pitchshifted]] vocals as well as its [[pornography]]-themed imagery and song titles. Cock and Ball Torture has been acclaimed as one of the more-noteworthy acts in the [[pornogrind]] subgenre.
